select.upload-info: To make sure the image looks right and doesn't get stretched or cut downed, please use an image with a 16:9 ratio.

y-offset.details: If the text in the canvas do not line up properly, adjustments may be necessary.

add-model.description: Choose where to get your model.
add-model.sekai-description: Get access to models provided by Sekai Viewer!
add-model.static-description: Fallback option when Sekai Viewer is down.
add-model.upload-image-description: Upload a custom sprite image of your own.

selected-layer.delete-model-warn: This is the only layer and cannot be deleted.

costume.live2d-issue: This costume may be missing some parts.

emotion.rename-emotion: Enter a nice name for this emotion. Leave blank to reset.

parameters.tooltip: You can use your arrow keys to select and adjust parameters.

import-export.description: You can save the adjustments you made and load it to another model.

emotion-copy.description: This will copy all parameters from the expression and pose you set.
emotion-copy.confirm-description: The emotion parameters have successfully been copied.

live2d.access-live2d-parts: You are about to access all parts of this model. Continue?

model.live2d-changed-warn: You have custom Live2D parameter adjustments. Continuing will discard them!
model.long-wait: If the model is taking too long to load, consider getting models from SEKAI Stories instead.

experimental.details: If you don't see any changes, you may try refreshing the canvas.

clear.message: This will clear the whole canvas. Any progress will be lost!
clear.start-blank: Start with a blank canvas next time.

support.report-details: If you encounter any bugs or glitches, please report them on our GitHub repository.
support.details: If you enjoy using SEKAI Stories, you can support me through one of the following ways:
support.ko-fi-details: Donations are optional! I will also be posting the website updates there as well.
support.github-details: This project is completely open-source! You can report issues or open a pull request to contribute!
support.special-thanks-description: I would like to thank the owner of Sekai Viewer for allowing me to access their models through this site!

settings.auto-save-description: Your work is automatically saved every 3 minutes. If something goes wrong, you can download the latest backup as a SEKAISCENE file.

import-export.description: Custom backgrounds and sprites are not included in this SEKAISCENE file.

tutorial.initialSetup1: Adjust the slider until you don't see any red spots.
tutorial.initialSetup2: You can always change this back on the Text Menu.
tutorial.welcomeIntroHeader: This window will guide you on how to use this site.
tutorial.welcomeIntroParagraph1: If you are familiar with this application, you can close this window.
tutorial.welcomeIntroParagraph2: You can also open this tutorial at any time on Settings.
tutorial.menuNavigationHeader: These will navigate you between menus!
tutorial.selectUploadParagraph: Select backgrounds from Project SEKAI or upload your own.
tutorial.splitLocationParagraph: You can also do Split Location, showing two in one background.
tutorial.nameTagParagraph: This is where you put the names of your character.
tutorial.easySwitchParagraph: Easy Switch will allow you to switch between two characters without retyping.
tutorial.dialogueParagraph: This is where you put the dialogue of what the character is speaking.
tutorial.sceneTextParagraph: The time and location of the scene you're making, usually seen at the start of every PJSK story.
tutorial.selectedLayerParagraph: All the models shown on your work are located here. You can select and do some tweaking.
tutorial.addModelParagraph: You can add a new Live2D model character and upload your own image.
tutorial.transformParagraph: This will allow you to move, change the size, and hide the layer you selected.
tutorial.characterParagraph: If the selected model is a Live2D, you can select characters from the PJSK Cast.
tutorial.costumeParagraph: Once you have selected a character, you can select a costume of your choice.
tutorial.poseParagraph: Changes the pose of the character selected.
tutorial.expressionParagraph: Changes the facial expression of the character selected.
tutorial.mouthParagraph: Allows you to change and tweak the opening and shape of the mouth of a Live2D model.
tutorial.live2dParagraph: You can customize your own poses by tweaking the Live2D parameters and pause the idle animation.
tutorial.importExportParagraph: You can also save the adjustments you made and load it to another model.
tutorial.emotionCopyParagraph: Copies the Live2D Parameters of the current expression and pose you set.
tutorial.saveHeader: Once you're done, save your work!
tutorial.sceneImportExportParagraph: This will allow you to save and load your entire scene as an editable format.
tutorial.endParagraph: If you wish to repeat this, you can access them back on Settings.

save.note-1-desktop: If the download hasn't started, right click the image below and save.
save.note-1-phone: If the download hasn't started, tap and hold the image below and save.
save.note-2: You can disable this window on Settings.

error.no-valid-models: Add a new Live2D character model first.
error.default-scene-fail:
An error has occurred while loading the default scene.
Please use the clear button, refresh your browser, or clear your cookies.
If the problem persists, please report this bug on GitHub.
error.name-tag-inputs-limit: The limit is 2 to 6 inputs for name tag.
error.background-bookmark: You cannot set a bookmark for a custom background.
error.hide-everything-warning:
The "Hide models and dialogue" option under Scene Text is enabled.
Please disable this option on Text Menu.

mental-health.details: What you are feeling matters and you are not alone. If you're going through a difficult moment, you can click the button below to find resources and people who are there to help.
mental-health.settings-details: You can disable this message on Settings.
